rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C115304

definition: A grouping of observations within the Functional Test domain.
name: Category of Functional Test

terms.definition: Hauser Ambulation Index (AI) (Hauser SL, Dawson DM, Lehrich JR, Beal MF, Kevy SV, Propper RD, Mills JA, Weiner HL. Intensive immunosuppression in progressive multiple sclerosis. A randomized, three-arm study of high-dose intravenous cyclophosphamide, plasma exchange, and ACTH. N Engl J Med. 1983 Jan 27;308(4):173-80).
Nine-Hole Peg Test (NHPT) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
Paced Auditory Serial Addition Test (PASAT) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
terms.preferredTerm: Paced Auditory Serial Addition Functional Test

terms.definition: Symbol Digit Modalities Test (SDMT) (Copyright 1973 by Western Psychological Services).
6 Minute Walk Test (6MWT) (Goldman MD, Marrie RA, Cohen JA. Evaluation of the six-minute walk in multiple sclerosis subjects and healthy controls. Multiple Sclerosis 2008; 14: 383-390).
Timed 25-Foot Walk (T25FW) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
Timed Up and Go (TUG) (Podsiadlo D, Richardson S. The Timed 'Up & Go': a test of basic functional mobility for frail elderly persons. J Am Geriatr Soc. 1991; 39:142-148).
terms.preferredTerm: Timed Up and Go Functional Test
